comments: Java Puzzle #11 - 'Three solutions? Jump for joy!'
There are two obvious ways to solve this puzzle.
With some careful thinking a fast third way may jump out at you.
go(number): moves the avatar forward a given number of spaces
turnRight(): turns the avatar to the left.
jump(): jumps over the space directly in front of the avatar and lands on the space two in front of the avatar
